attributes.action: not appoint any MP leaving the House of Commons at the next General Election to the House of Lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A number of MPs will now apply to sit in the House of Lords after the next general election some of these may includes MPs named and shamed in the expenses row.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
